Section Header: Please answer the following questions on your beliefs about how the Coronavirus is affecting people of your race/ethnicity.
Field Label: I believe the country has become more dangerous for people in my racial/ethnic group because of fear of the Coronavirus.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly disagree | 2, Somewhat disagree | 3, Somewhat agree | 4, Strongly agree

Field Label: People of my race/ethnicity are more likely to lose their job because of the Coronavirus.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly disagree | 2, Somewhat disagree | 3, Somewhat agree | 4, Strongly agree

Field Label: I worry about people thinking I have the Coronavirus simply because of my race/ethnicity.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly disagree | 2, Somewhat disagree | 3, Somewhat agree | 4, Strongly agree

Field Label: Most social and mass media reports about the Coronavirus create bias against people of my racial/ethnic group.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly disagree | 2, Somewhat disagree | 3, Somewhat agree | 4, Strongly agree

Field Label: People of my race/ethnicity are more likely to get the Coronavirus.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly disagree | 2, Somewhat disagree | 3, Somewhat agree | 4, Strongly agree

Field Label: People of my race/ethnicity will not receive Coronavirus healthcare as good as the care received by other groups.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly disagree | 2, Somewhat disagree | 3, Somewhat agree | 4, Strongly agree

Field Label: Due to the Coronavirus I have been cyberbullied because of my race/ethnicity
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly disagree | 2, Somewhat disagree | 3, Somewhat agree | 4, Strongly agree

Field Label: Since the Coronavirus I have seen a lot more cyberbullying of people of my race/ethnicity.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly disagree | 2, Somewhat disagree | 3, Somewhat agree | 4, Strongly agree

Field Label: Negative social media posts against people of my race/ethnicity have increased because of the Coronavirus.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Strongly disagree | 2, Somewhat disagree | 3, Somewhat agree | 4, Strongly agree

Field Label:
Scoring Instructions

Each item on the CRBS is rated on a 4-point scale, from 1 (strongly disagree) to 4 (strongly agree). The CRBS score is the mean of the 9 items.
